io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty

Class DnsHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.DnsHeader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DnsQueryHeader, DnsResponseHeader

    public class DnsHeader
extends Object
    The header super-class which includes information shared by DNS query and response packet headers such as the ID, opcode, and type. The only flag shared by both classes is the flag for desiring recursion.

      • OPCODE_IQUERY

        @Deprecated
public static final int OPCODE_IQUERY
        Deprecated. 
        Message is for an inverse query. Note: inverse queries have been obsoleted since RFC 3425, and are not necessarily supported.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
